# Locomotion

> Twenty-four views of a house cat.

<!-- <intro> -->

[Image][getty-src] of Eadweard J. Muybridge's collotype of a house cat.

<!-- <image align="center" src="./data/image.jpg" alt="Twenty-four views of a house cat"> -->

<div class="image" align="center">
    <img src="" alt="Twenty-four views of a house cat">
    <br>
</div>

<!-- </image> -->

<!-- </intro> -->


<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var image = require( '@stdlib/datasets/img-locomotion-house-cat' );
```

#### image

A [buffer][node-buffer] containing image data.

``` javascript
var img = image;
// returns <Buffer>
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

<!-- TODO: more creative example. -->

## Examples

``` javascript
var image = require( '@stdlib/datasets/img-locomotion-house-cat' );

console.log( image );
```

<!-- </examples> -->


<!-- <cli> -->

---

## CLI

<!-- <usage> -->

### Usage

``` bash
Usage: locomotion-house-cat [options]

Options:

  -h,    --help                Print this message.
  -V,    --version             Print the package version.
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

### Examples

``` bash
$ locomotion-house-cat | <image_viewer>
```

<!-- </examples> -->

<!-- </cli> -->
